doc.title: How Rube Stopped the Trolley Car
doc.plot: This is a street scene in Philadelphia in which a Rube and his girl are walking, "seeing the sights." Rube becomes inquisitive, and leaving Mandy for a moment, he walks across the track and stands directly in the path of a fast approaching trolley car, which scoops him up in the fender. This film is extremely funny.
